resources.string: This permission is needed to show an overlay over the other apps
This permission is needed for normal foreground service work
You need to grant all permissions to start a game
Your device doesn\'t have hole\-punch camera, so you can\'t play this game
Don\'t forget to stop Dynamic Ocean, when you are not using it to prevent unwanted battery drain
• Tap the button below to start the Dynamic Ocean\n• Shake your device to activate game field and tilt it to trap the Blowfish in a camera hole
